signals.problem_statement: The customer is currently managing multiple inboxes and spreadsheets, leading to an inefficient and error-prone workflow.
signals.customer_ask: The customer wants to automate their workflows and consolidate communication into a single inbox.
signals.suggested_solution: The customer suggested using tokens in email subject lines to route replies correctly based on brand.
signals.context: The customer is a fractional consulting service for high volume photography studios, managing multiple brands.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks the knowledge to engineer the automation and token system needed for their communication setup.
signals.customer_ask: The customer is looking for guidance on how to implement the token system and ensure proper email routing.
signals.suggested_solution: The customer expressed a need for support in understanding how to set up the automation correctly.
signals.context: The customer is working with a client that has multiple brands and needs to separate responses based on brand.
